nodes.text: The Umboo Racing Team was a team for the Roon Colonial Games lead by Auren Yomm. It was consisted of Yomm, her friend Gee Long, and the droid BIX. They specialized in the Drainsweeper event. When Governor Bisad Koong poisoned Long and sabotaged BIX one year during the games, they were replaced by Mungo Baobab and C-3PO that year.
